Package pl.touk.hades.sql.timemonitoring

Interface Summary
Repo  
SqlTimeBasedHadesMBean An interface implemented by SqlTimeBasedHades that enables jmx access to the data source.
SqlTimeBasedMonitor  
SqlTimeCalculator  
 

Class Summary
Average A class containing an average of some set of longs, the size of the set and the last value added to the set.
MonitorRunLogPrefix Text logged as prefix of logged messages.
RepoJdbcImpl  
SqlTimeBasedHades Hades whose monitor is of type SqlTimeBasedMonitorImpl.
SqlTimeBasedLoadFactory A factory that produces an instance of Load class when given a pair of numeric values: the main database load and the failover database load.
SqlTimeBasedMonitorImpl Monitor that activates failover when the main data source is overloaded in comparison to the failover data source.
SqlTimeBasedTimerTaskMonitor Monitor that is a TimerTask and uses SqlTimeBasedMonitorImpl to measure load of the associated hades.
SqlTimeCalculatorImpl  
State
